name: Kids
text: رَبِّ|Lord|59|66|7$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|(of) the heavens|132|146|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ|and the earth|111|125|352$وَمَا|and whatever|111|125|46$بَيْنَهُمَآ‌ۖ|(is) between both of them,|200|214|3978$إِن|if|44|51|225$كُنتُم|you|60|305|214$مُّوقِنِينَ|would be certain.|135|380|12903$

name: Kids
text: لَآ|(There is) no|106|117|30$إِلَـٰهَ|god|53|74|2266$إِلَّا|except|65|86|86$هُوَ|Him;|49|70|298$يُحْىِۦ|He gives life|100|121|2306$وَيُمِيتُ‌ۖ|and causes death,|143|164|2307$رَبُّكُمْ|your Lord|82|93|3243$وَرَبُّ|and (the) Lord|116|202|12356$ءَابَآئِكُمُ|(of) your fathers|131|303|15576$ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ|the former.|94|180|5507$

name: Kids
text: أَنَّىٰ|How can|77|96|1961$لَهُمُ|(there be) for them|149|186|1027$ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ|the reminder,|108|146|5700$وَقَدْ|when verily,|100|138|2117$جَآءَهُمْ|had come to them|141|160|853$رَسُولٌ|a Messenger|103|356|839$مُّبِينٌ|clear.|66|319|1467$

name: Kids
text: إِنَّا|Indeed, We|96|105|120$كَاشِفُواْ|(will) remove|105|122|15582$ٱلْعَذَابِ|the punishment|122|139|482$قَلِيلاً‌ۚ|a little,|67|84|433$إِنَّكُمْ|indeed, you|97|114|514$عَآئِدُونَ|(will) return.|102|111|15583$

name: Kids
text: يَوْمَ|(The) Day|87|111|1057$نَبْطِشُ|We will seize|104|152|15584$ٱلْبَطْشَةَ|(with) the seizure|138|186|15585$ٱلْكُبْرَىٰٓ|the greatest,|108|156|11391$إِنَّا|indeed, We|94|118|120$مُنتَقِمُونَ|(will) take retribution.|164|164|13902$

name: Kids
text: ۞ وَلَقَدْ|And certainly,|112|122|640$فَتَنَّا|We tried|76|96|5627$قَبْلَهُمْ|before them|100|120|11274$قَوْمَ|(the) people|102|122|8321$فِرْعَوْنَ|(of) Firaun,|95|115|2649$وَجَآءَهُمْ|and came to them|141|151|15586$رَسُولٌ|a Messenger|103|355|839$كَرِيمٌ|noble.|68|320|7136$

name: Kids
text: وَأَن|And that|78|85|1470$لَّا|(do) not|75|88|30$تَعْلُواْ|exalt yourselves|127|140|13181$عَلَى|against|68|81|52$ٱللَّهِ‌ۖ|Allah.|56|69|606$إِنِّىٓ|Indeed, I|80|93|312$ءَاتِيكُم|[I] have come to you|162|169|11352$بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ|with an authority|134|372|9542$مُّبِينٍ|clear.|66|304|3469$

name: Kids
text: وَإِنِّى|And indeed, I|108|115|2795$عُذْتُ|[I] seek refuge|119|134|15125$بِرَبِّى|with my Lord|105|120|10782$وَرَبِّكُمْ|and your Lord|111|126|8552$أَن|lest|44|59|655$تَرْجُمُونِ|you stone me.|115|122|15588$

name: Kids
text: فَأَسْرِ|Then `Set out|116|130|8654$بِعِبَادِى|with My slaves|118|146|11536$لَيْلاً|(by) night.|91|120|8102$إِنَّكُم|Indeed, you|99|128|514$مُّتَّبَعُونَ|(will be) followed.|137|151|12929$

name: Kids
text: فَمَا|And not|72|84|132$بَكَتْ|wept|64|89|15596$عَلَيْهِمُ|for them|76|101|602$ٱلسَّمَآءُ|the heaven|95|120|12745$وَٱلْأَرْضُ|and the earth|111|136|3278$وَمَا|and not|71|96|46$كَانُواْ|they were|87|99|94$مُنظَرِينَ|given respite.|110|110|9716$

name: Kids
text: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly,|112|135|640$نَجَّيْنَا|We saved|85|132|8559$بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٲٓءِيلَ|(the) Children of Israel|170|216|10567$مِنَ|from|50|96|156$ٱلْعَذَابِ|the punishment|122|145|482$ٱلْمُهِينِ|the humiliating,|121|121|14235$

name: Kids
text: وَمَا|And not|72|80|46$خَلَقْنَا|We created|97|112|7029$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|130|351$وَٱلْأَرْضَ|and the earth|111|126|2280$وَمَا|and whatever|111|126|46$بَيْنَهُمَا|(is) between them|142|150|3978$لَـٰعِبِينَ|(in) play.|80|80|11739$

name: Kids
text: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|88|58$يَوْمَ ٱلْفَصْلِ|(the) Day of Judgment|170|207|15605$مِيقَـٰتُهُمْ|(is) an appointed term for them|229|266|15606$أَجْمَعِينَ|all.|95|114|1408$

name: Kids
text: إِلَّا|Except,|70|85|86$مَن|(on) whom|91|121|76$رَّحِمَ ٱللَّهُ‌ۚ|Allah has mercy.|129|159|15608$إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed, He|92|122|396$هُوَ|[He]|49|79|298$ٱلْعَزِيزُ|(is) the All-Mighty,|145|160|1187$ٱلرَّحِيمُ|the Most Merciful.|140|140|398$

name: Kids
text: كَٱلْمُهْلِ|Like the murky oil,|140|192|10733$يَغْلِى|it will boil|81|186|15611$فِى|in|48|153|89$ٱلْبُطُونِ|the bellies,|92|144|15612$

name: Kids
text: خُذُوهُ|`Seize him|90|116|15614$فَٱعْتِلُوهُ|and drag him|105|157|15615$إِلَىٰ|into|53|105|118$سَوَآءِ|(the) midst|94|146|5093$ٱلْجَحِيمِ|(of) the Hellfire,|126|152|1107$

name: Kids
text: كَذَٲلِكَ|Thus.|77|116|702$وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم|And We will marry them|176|255|15622$بِحُورٍ عِينٍ|(to) companions with beautiful eyes.|264|304|15623$

name: Kids
text: لَا|Not|43|58|30$يَذُوقُونَ|they will taste|115|146|15625$فِيهَا|therein|66|97|253$ٱلْمَوْتَ|the death|85|116|894$إِلَّا|except|65|96|86$ٱلْمَوْتَةَ|the death|85|116|15626$ٱلْأُولَىٰ‌ۖ|the first.|81|96|11384$وَوَقَـٰهُمْ|And He will protect them|184|233|15627$عَذَابَ|(from the) punishment|168|266|1786$ٱلْجَحِيمِ|(of) the Hellfire,|126|175|1107$

name: Kids
text: فَإِنَّمَا|Indeed,|70|80|1086$يَسَّرْنَـٰهُ|We have made it easy|168|188|11327$بِلِسَانِكَ|in your tongue|116|136|11328$لَعَلَّهُمْ|so that they may|135|155|1621$يَتَذَكَّرُونَ|take heed.|107|117|1946$
